data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 22,020 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Madhepura, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 22,020 believers in Madhepura against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Madhepura, Bihar, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Madhepura.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Mukeri people. Make the Mukeri people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, teach the church in the county of Madhepura to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, 2,001,800 people live in the county of Madhepura. Please, give them 400 new simple churches this year.

data.section_summary:
the county of Madhepura, Bihar, India has a population of 2,001,800.

We estimate Madhepura has 22,020 people who might know Jesus, 24,288 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,955,492 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Madhepura, Bihar, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Madhepura
location.people_groups_list: Laheri (Muslim traditions), Bania Barnawar, Brahmin, Bania Sinduria, Dhanuk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Laheri (Muslim traditions) (56,000), Bania Barnawar (65,000), Brahmin (58,787,000), Bania Sinduria (26,000), Dhanuk (4,203,000)
